question: My uncle has recently been hospitalized because hes had a stroke, and also has type 2 diabetes. His blood sugar his really high and the doctors don't seem to be doing anything about it. They are running tests on him, but the doctors say that they still can't figure out what is wrong with him. And i was wondering if a blood transfusion may be helpful to him. Also i was wondering how you'd know for sure if his liver failed as well?This discussion is related to/posts/show/764102.
title: type 2 diabetes
